headline: James Altucher: Soaring Internet Costs and Failing Networks Make Starlink “A Godsend for Consumers”
summary: Altucher Points to Rising Prices, Slower Speeds, and Industry Failures as Starlink’s Rapid Expansion Crosses Six Million UsersWashington, D.C., Nov. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Technology analyst and bestselling author James Altucher says America’s internet crisis has reached a breaking point — and that Starlink is emerging as the clearest alternative for millions of frustrated users around the world. headline: ASTS vs. IBM: Which Connectivity Innovator is the Better Buy Today?
summary: IBM's steady growth, improving estimates and lower valuation help it stand out as the stronger pick in this two-stock connectivity showdown.

headline: Bernstein Reiterates a Hold on Verizon Communications (VZ)
summary: ​Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is one of the Best Communication and Media Stocks to Buy Now. On November 18, analyst Laurent Yoon from Bernstein reiterated a Hold rating on Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) with a $46 price target. ​The rating follows a report by Reuters released on November 13, which noted that the company’s new […]
